website_summaries.verdict: A great feature set, although some other options are sturdier and more attractive.
cons: Some owners find them flimsy and not very stylish
They also tend to hold condensation and leave rings on tables

customer_reviews.title: these are the absolute best ever! would reorder again and again
customer_reviews.text: these are the absolute best ever! would reorder again and again! We have a contemporary or modern great room... with both wood and metal table.. loves that they are a soft rubber ...no scratches what so every.. insulate both cold and hot....perfect.
customer_reviews.author: LWilsy

customer_reviews.title: Condensation drips
customer_reviews.text: I bought these based on the good reviews saying condensation will not drip from containers set on them. Well, that may be true in cool climates or with mild condensation. But in really hot, humid weather the water just pools in the bottom of the coaster and drips on furniture and people when picking up the glass/bottle/can to drink from. 2 Stars for the fun colors, but these do not work for me as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: MsKimZ

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice if you have a lot of wood/glass surfaces.
customer_reviews.text: I realized my bamboo coasters were scratching and nicking my new dining room table and coffee table, so I looked for an alternative. These coasters have been GREAT so far. They look classier than I thought they would for being solid black. They don't damage anything and are easy to move around. Liquid collects without spilling over the side (like it might with a perfectly flat coaster), and they dry easily within a few hours. I've owned them for about a year, and despite constant use, they look like they've only been lightly used.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: I had been on a long search for the perfect coaster when a friend recommended these
customer_reviews.text: I had been on a long search for the perfect coaster when a friend recommended these. PROS: no leakage underneath, don't stick to the glass when you lift it, can be washed CONS: While I'm happy condensation isn't absorbed and transferred to the protective surface underneath, the condensation is just collected under the groves and drips on the protective surface whenever I lift my glass.
customer_reviews.author: LD Crowe

customer_reviews.title: The coasters are good but still just rubber place mats for beverages
customer_reviews.text: The coasters are good but still just rubber place mats for beverages.
customer_reviews.author: william brosch

customer_reviews.title: I love these coaters!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second set!!! I liked the ones that I ordered for my table in my patio, so I decided that I would order some for my tables inside because they are so well made and hold the water away from my furniture. I've started thinking about starting buying some Christmas gifts early because I'm not going to go out shopping in the crowds this year and I'm probably going to buy another set for my nephew and his family for Christmas and I can think of a few more people on my list that could use them as well. For the price, you can't beet the deal!!!
customer_reviews.author: NolesGal

customer_reviews.title: Five stars!!! Outstanding drink coasters.
customer_reviews.text: These drink coasters are the best, they really do the job with handling even the most coldest drinks that are known to leave behind fog rings onto any table surface, especially glass, they are very easy to clean, and can be a great gift for just about anyone. Also these coasters alone are cheap and affordable. But other than that I love how great they look on both my living room & kitchen table. Thanks Amazon.🙂
customer_reviews.author: Sparky Williams

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for all drinks
customer_reviews.text: I love these coasters. They are colorful and fun. They are slightly bigger than normal coasters therefore can hold anything from teacups to beermugs. Some people complain about condensation outside. I did not experience that. It might happen on a more humid day outdoors but not indoors. I use them for water glasses on nightstand or on coffee tables for coffee and chilled drinks. My kids picked their favorite colors. Deep grooves keep any condensation or spill inside the coaster. They are very easy to clean. Just rinse them or toss them in dishwasher. Safe for all types of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: A Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Well I needed some coasters for my new living room digs and was astounded at the choices available on Amazon and that the price points were all over the place. I decided to give these rather different looking coasters a try. I really didn't expect much for the price but I liked the facts that it was a pack of 6 and that it came with it's own holder. When they arrived I was pleasantly surprised. They are well made, big enough for jumbo fountain drinks, work very well protecting furniture and are surprisingly pleasing to the touch as well as the eye. All around a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: 5wackos

customer_reviews.title: Most Useful Coaster Possible
customer_reviews.text: I was once given beautiful hand made coasters from Figi but completely useless. Water pools up around the base of the cup and could even drain off the side. Then it would stick to the bottom of the cup all the time. They weren't large enough for my larger cups. These coasters aren't that! The condensation drains into the base which is rubber. They are easy to clean. They never stick to the bottom of the cup. They are flexible and durable for any size cup. It is just a perfect simple design.
customer_reviews.author: BP50

customer_reviews.title: Durable coasters
customer_reviews.text: I really like these coasters. They are not that attractive to look at but they make great Family Room coasters. I like their large size. The holder is a plus. Condensation still collects in the coasters, but better than the flat coasters that I usually use, where water floats off and ruins my furniture. And these stay put. They don't lift when removing my glass. They look exactly like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Norma

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: They look nice on our living room end tables. Only thing that is a bit disappointing is that you can’t clean them well. Due to the rubber like material, you can’t use a cleaning cloth or even a paper towel to wipe them off. It leaves the lint from the cleaning cloths and pieces of fuzz. But they are good quality. And I like that they can’t/won’t scratch my end tables.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These coasters can be used for regular glasses and mugs, which was exactly what I was looking for. 1 star for "Absorbency" because this coaster doesn't absorb the water, it contains it. Which is to be expected from the material is made of! Not a complaint, I just wanted to clarify my rating for any potential buyers. These coasters are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple and functional
customer_reviews.text: Very simple design perfect for my husband’s man cave! The size is great to accommodate larger glasses and mugs. Does not slide around, does not stick to your cup, absorbs well and cleans easily. I love that this comes with 6 coasters plus a holder. It is not small so check dimensions before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Kia W

customer_reviews.title: Washable and they hold a lot of water
customer_reviews.text: My favorite thing about these coasters is that you can wash them!! I have always bought wooden ones in the past, and with the constant water on them they eventually mold...nasty!!! Also, they hold a lot of water in them with out spilling on to your table surface. These aren't fancy by any means, but they are so much more practical and I am happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: shopgirl

customer_reviews.title: Love These
customer_reviews.text: I really love these coasters. They keep stains of our furniture, don't slide around, and I really love the bright colors. Makes catching the drip actually fun! Most of all, I appreciate that when our little grandkids come to visit , they won't have a heavy ceramic coaster fall on their foot. And, that means alot to me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best coasters out there!
customer_reviews.text: Black goes with any decor. The silicone is heat resistant to protect any surface and allows them to be cleaned easily and quickly. Being textured they can also catch a fair amount of liquid before spilling onto your surface. 5/5!
customer_reviews.author: Skhy Blitzer

customer_reviews.title: Will not slip
customer_reviews.text: These are great coasters although not the best Designor look. They work great. Can be used on top of a drink to keep bugs out if outside. I put them everywhere, including to hold candles so they do not get knocked over.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Brisker

customer_reviews.title: Look no further. No frills, inexpensive, as pictured and very washable.
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I wanted. Reasonable size to fit a very large ikea beer mug, but not too big to look awkward or take up too much space. The colors are very vibrant. Overall super pleased with these!
customer_reviews.author: Rick A.

customer_reviews.title: I like coasters that glasses and cups can't easily slide off
customer_reviews.text: I'm a little picky when it comes to coasters. I like coasters that glasses and cups can't easily slide off. I like coasters that collect drips and condensation from ice. I like a little texture that feels like the glass or cup adhere a bit or at least aren't slippery.. All this said- I love these. They also have a great look . I bought them for an apartment with a modern contemporary theme and they look great on the glass tables. I think they would look good in a variety of aesthetics. Really pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Jake R.

customer_reviews.title: Seem pretty baby-safe to me.
customer_reviews.text: While my 18-month son enjoys playing with these, they're obviously functional, too. I was trying to find a set of coasters that wouldn't hurt the baby, who is now getting into everything. These are made with safe materials (I am really pretty sure-- I did a lot of research, but I'm no "ingredient" expert), so I feel okay with him putting these in his mouth. He likes to put the coaster holder on his head. It's loads of fun.
customer_reviews.author: E.C.B.

customer_reviews.title: Will save the table
customer_reviews.text: I like these because they catch any condensation that falls to the bottom of the drink rather than pooling and spilling over onto the table. My house gets really dusty so these are easy to clean, just rinse with water and let dry!
customer_reviews.author: Kaori K.

customer_reviews.title: Very colorful and useful!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set because I needed one yellow coaster and this whole set is awesome! Very colorful and condensation collects nicely without overflowing. Perfect set of fun coasters.
customer_reviews.author: L. C. Cape

customer_reviews.title: These are AWESOME!!! The BEST coasters ever 👍😉
customer_reviews.text: I Love this brand of coasters so much that this is the fourth set that I bought. This set has bright fun colors. Just like the 3 Espresso sets that I have, these wash very well. Just throw them in the dishwasher. I have had my other 3 sets for over 2 years and even though they are used every day, they look brand new!! I just can't say enough goi3d things about them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gram Tam

customer_reviews.title: Good but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: I've been using both sides (different patterns) of these for several weeks and generally like them better than what I was using before. However, there will still be the chance of small leaks onto your furniture because the rim height is, I think, too short. Surface tension of the rubber lets large blobs of water build up near the rim and sometimes spill onto your furniture, either by hitting the blobs with your glass or any vibrations. Unfortunately, in my experience, the water, as it accumulates, doesn't actually flow out and fill up all the area of the coaster which might alleviate these problems.
customer_reviews.author: mikeinga

customer_reviews.title: Silicone coaster
customer_reviews.text: Very colorful set, I wished it came with more. It’s a bit pricy for what it is compared to other sets. I like the size also, perfect for even the largest of mugs. Very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Coaster
customer_reviews.text: They are a soft silicone coaster. Big diameter accepts almost everything you will drink from. They provide a very stable platform that won't mar the surface that they are placed on. So far they are great. If the volume of water they hold is an issue, fold a small paper towel in quarters and place it on the coaster.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce T. Smith

customer_reviews.title: We liked these so much that we ended up ordering a ...
customer_reviews.text: We liked these so much that we ended up ordering a 2nd set. They are just the right thickness -- we've set drinks on them off-center and they don't topple over. They are nice and wide, enabling you to put fairly wide-circumference drinks on them. Any condensation from your drink will drip down into the coaster nubs and not onto your table. They are dishwasher safe. They aren't fancy, but they are very practical and functional.
customer_reviews.author: S. McInnes

customer_reviews.title: Great coasters!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been looking for coasters like this for awhile and these are absolutely perfect and easy to clean, they didn’t have a chemical oder to them when they arrived and have been amazing!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer2222

customer_reviews.title: Perfect living room coasters
customer_reviews.text: I was never a coaster type, but picked these up to help preserve a new table I bought. I liked them so much I bought a second set. Super easy to clean, and they keep those rings off my tables from people's drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Firman

customer_reviews.title: Work Fine
customer_reviews.text: They're probably a little expensive, but if you don't want to go out and look for coasters at the store, just bite the bullet. They're coasters. I don't know how much you can say about them. They coast well.
customer_reviews.author: izzy

customer_reviews.title: A great coaster!
customer_reviews.text: The coasters arrived in my mailbox so quickly. I bought them to protect the wood coffee table my husband built me and they go over and beyond. They are nice looking and of very good quality. They’re wider than the botttom of a glass and they don’t slip or stick to the bottom of a glass. They come with their own coaster holder of the same rubbery material, which is also very nice. They’re stylish. I just love them!
customer_reviews.author: Hilary

customer_reviews.title: Great coasters
customer_reviews.text: These are a rubber coaster that doesn’t absorb anything. HOWEVER i love them. they are super easy to clean and look nice. you just rinse them with water to clean off. i haven’t had any spillage problems and no water residue on my tables.
customer_reviews.author: Haiden

customer_reviews.title: Great coasters
customer_reviews.text: Love these coasters. I've ordered several different kinds of coasters since Christmas. All, but these, were thirsty stone and I was hesitant to order these but I am so glad I did. Some of the stone ones arrived broken and now I'm worried about the rest of them breaking, prematurely. These silicone coasters are large, flexible, lightweight, have groves to catch any condensation and they were priced under $15 for 6, including the holder! I will definitely buy more of their products (for myself & for gift giving)
customer_reviews.author: Gwen Steinmeyer

customer_reviews.title: BEST COASTERS TO BUY
customer_reviews.text: Great coasters,- best I've found in years. Made of rubberized product which holds moisture from iced drinks & doesn't leave a mark on your fourniture . Glass coasters adhere to the bottom of the glass when the Glass is picked up & then fall off & break. Paper coasters leak moisture thru & leave marks on the furniture. These do neither, & come in a holder of 4 coasters per set . The only reason i did not give a rating of 5 was they only come in black & I would have preferred more decorative colors.
customer_reviews.author: Barbra Buck

customer_reviews.title: Great Coasters
customer_reviews.text: Great! My drinks tend to cause condensation and slide off wood, glass, metal coasters for years. These hold cups, glasses even small bowls. Easy to clean with hot water and dish washing liquid. Plus they have a nice holder for the coasters.
customer_reviews.author: D.L. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Great coasters
customer_reviews.text: Love these, the have plenty of space. The condensation can drain easily. They are rubber so they don't absorb but they're wonderful. Extremely durable, easily to clean. Definitely a great buy
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Match Every Style and Work as Intended
customer_reviews.text: I bought these years ago and everyone loves them, they match all the furniture styles I can imagine and they work as intended. Only issue I occasionally have is if I use a paper coffee cup on them they don't always sit level due to the grooves. Not enough of an issue to bring it down a star.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew W. Dengler

customer_reviews.title: Desk Coasters
customer_reviews.text: I got these for use on my desk. Not so much for the desk, but it's a good habit. Self Care, and all that. Nothing fancy, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: Water Resistant Coasters
customer_reviews.text: Coasters are great and I look forward to a future without water damage on wood tables. I’ve learned that beautiful tile coasters with cork backing are not impervious to water. I did not appreciate the coaster holder because it is superfluous.
customer_reviews.author: Andigal

customer_reviews.title: They also catch any drips and condensation nicely. They're a flexible rubber so you could take ...
customer_reviews.text: Simple, functional, exactly what I needed at work. They're larger than a coffee cup bottom so they'll fit most anything you would need. They also catch any drips and condensation nicely. They're a flexible rubber so you could take them and rinse them under the sink easily. The side shown has the round bumps, but if you prefer the other side has thin rings in-case your cup has a hard time with the bumps. I have yet to have that issue though and we had everything from Starbucks cups to plastic bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Get these coasters
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for coasters that don't pick up your glass/cup/tankard/etc, and are big enough to hold virtually any container, these are it. So happy with this obvious solution to a common problem!
customer_reviews.author: Easy-P

customer_reviews.title: Pretty lame coasters
customer_reviews.text: Seemed nice at first especially for the price and quantity that you get, but you soon find that the wetness emitted into tho coaster by your drinks sits there and basically doesn't ever dry up. I think one time I left moisture in one of the coasters for about 4 days and I started seeing some white moldy-looking substance forming. Also you can't really expect to take a sip from your drink without having water dangling from the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: jeffery stewart

customer_reviews.title: Brighten Your Life
customer_reviews.text: These coasters are fun, brightly colored (as seen in photo), and are made of a soft, rubber-like material that keeps your cup from sliding. The coasters keep moisture contained so that it doesn't ruin your tabletop, desk, nightstands, and any other water sensitive surfaces. Add brightness to your life when you purchase this coaster set at a very competitive price.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great coaster set
customer_reviews.text: Great coaster set...wide enough to use w/ any type of drinkware. Wet glasses don't stick due to the rubber bumps/indentations. Vinyl coasters can be used for cold or hot beverages protecting all types of surfaces. The holder keeps the coasters together in a holder made of the same material as the coasters. Good coaster set especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: JulianeTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Great Coasters
customer_reviews.text: The coasters are very useful for controlling condensation from cold drinks and offer a nice place to rest hot drinks. They don't stick to the bottom of the glass.
customer_reviews.author: txron01

customer_reviews.title: coasters
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe I am being asked to review these... .They are coasters. yes they are good. they sit under a glass perfectly. pure genius.
customer_reviews.author: dan graesser

customer_reviews.title: Bright colors add to appeal of coasters!
customer_reviews.text: Liked the pretty colors and ease of cleaning these coasters. They also would make great hostess or house-warming gifts. Easy to store & receive many compliments. Recommend !
customer_reviews.author: cody

customer_reviews.title: Use a coaster
customer_reviews.text: These are great for all types of bottles, cans, glass wear. Long lasting, durable material.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great coasters
customer_reviews.text: These coasters are perfect for my needs. They don't slip and slide on the table. They don't stick to the bottom of my glasses and they hold enough moisture. I like the width. I find most coasters too narrow for my mugs and wine glasses. I also happen to find them attractive. I happen to like manhole covers.
customer_reviews.author: Anon.

customer_reviews.title: Stay in Place!
customer_reviews.text: These are the first coasters I've found, and I've tried plenty over the years, that will not stick to your glass when it sweats then fall off! They are cute and colorful but main thing for me is the brilliant design keeps them in place and with no drippage. Best thing I've bought in ages!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine C.

customer_reviews.title: Don't need replaced for awhile
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic we use them every day look forward to having them for awhile
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Merlyn Joseph Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Nice Coasters
customer_reviews.text: I bought new furniture for my living room, including new tables. Within a few days I started noticing rings on my tables. I went to all the stores in town to find coasters but was unsuccessful. I ordered these because I didnt want the tables to be scratched up by ceramic coasters. I like that these are silicone so they are easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and cheerful
customer_reviews.text: Finally I can see where my coffee mug is going to land on dark wood night stand.
customer_reviews.author: Blakes

customer_reviews.title: Best All-Purpose Coasters on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking durable coasters are great for all types of drinks and anything else that you don't want to damage your furniture. These coasters have a good grip on both sides and hold lots of condensation and small spills. We use some for our salt lamps but mostly to prevent damage to furniture from drinks and also to keep things from sliding around on our glass tables. Also, the coaster holder is silicone too so you don't have to worry about it rusting, breaking, or falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: JWW

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what a coaster should be
customer_reviews.text: It's attractive, catches ALL the weeping liquid, and stays in place like it's glued down. Only coasters I'll use now.
customer_reviews.author: oneduffy12

customer_reviews.title: Glass holders
customer_reviews.text: It was very sturdy and sticky when I put the glasses on
customer_reviews.author: Thi Dien Chau Truong

customer_reviews.title: Great Coasters
customer_reviews.text: Rubber on both sides, large surface area, no complaints here. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Great set of coasters!
customer_reviews.text: Great size and protects my beautiful dining room table. The colors are fun and I really liked that it came with a holder for the coasters. I've even used them to protect my table from heat as well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them!  No regrets on price.
customer_reviews.text: These are AWESOME! Condensation has plenty of room to go with these coasters. I have no regrets paying $15 for these coasters. Might even purchases more for other rooms.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Large and flexible
customer_reviews.text: I thought these would be a hard plastic material but they are a soft flexible silicone material. A bit larger than I expected but they will hold large drinks nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel  J

customer_reviews.title: Best Value for the Money
customer_reviews.text: I like these coasters for a few reasons. 1. The are large enough for all the beverages I put on them. I don't have to carefully line up the drink so it won't be in danger of tipping or dripping outside of the coaster. 2. The bumpy texture on the top ensures it doesn't cling to sweaty drinks like a flat surface does. 3. They'll last a long time. Durable. 4. They're black so they blend into the background & don't attract attention. The ultimate coaster would be make of cork to evaporate mositure quickly, but you'd lose durability. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Pac_Eddy

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: These very much do what they are supposed to do. I like them. I brought them because the wooden ones I purchased in the past always stuck to the glass when picking it up. These predominately don't do that, but it did happen one time. Condensation is a pain. Overall, these are nice.
customer_reviews.author: OT

customer_reviews.title: Rubber Coasters
customer_reviews.text: Work well, keep my coffee hotter than sitting the mug on cold granite countertops. Machine washable.
customer_reviews.author: JR & SR Kincaid

customer_reviews.title: Coasters are really nice. I saw some at a house we rented ...
customer_reviews.text: Coasters are really nice. I saw some at a house we rented for the summer and I ordered some that looked like them before I left the house. The holder is rubber and I would have preferred metal, but this is what I found. Coasters work great, and they have the added benefit that the toddler grandchildren love to play with them - safe for kids!
customer_reviews.author: David Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Overall they are good coasters - safe to leave on the coffee table ...
customer_reviews.text: They stick to the bottom of my glasses when I pick up the glass, but it drops off of the glass quickly (a lot more quickly than with the glass coasters we used to use). Overall they are good coasters - safe to leave on the coffee table - I know my 8 month old won't get hurt when she pulls these off of it!
customer_reviews.author: cjsbooks11

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t absorb anything,water just sits in it
customer_reviews.text: I do not like them. They fill up with the water and I have to empty them and dry them. Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Molly babcock

customer_reviews.title: Great Coasters
customer_reviews.text: I have been in need of coasters for my desk and these are great. They are silicone and the don't absorb the water, which I really like. They are washable once the water dries at the bottom. I also like that the coaster holder is big enough for a bottle of wine.
customer_reviews.author: Rose R.

customer_reviews.title: Simple but Very Good
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a drink coaster that was simple yet would do the following things well; 1. Retain the moisture from the glass. 2. Not be picked up when I raise the glass due to the suction of the moisture under the glass. 3. Not damage the furniture by scratching when moved. These coasters do everything I asked. They are soft so they don't damage the furniture, They have raises dimples to hold the glass and still allow the water to drain preventing the suction when you lift your glass. They have a large enough lip to catch the moisture. Plus they blend in with my end tables. I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Richard wendt

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: These coasters are nice! They’re silicone and have a grip on one side for the table and grip circle design so that your cups don’t slide around anywhere. Even when the cup condensates it doesn’t leave a mess or soaks through the coasters. Easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Just put them in dishwasher and wadh
customer_reviews.text: Love these coasters Water does not get on my table.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Beasley

customer_reviews.title: Great coasters
customer_reviews.text: I like these coasters, they're wide enough to fit almost any drink you can imagine. Only nitpick is I wish it was a bit more absorbent, sometimes when I pick up the glass there's a bit of water clinging to the bottom of the glass that wasn't absorbed by the coaster. But for the most part it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great as a gift for yourself
customer_reviews.text: Use on dining room table , and coffee table, just as described.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need in a coaster!
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully designed and manufactured! Arrived quickly and professionally packaged. Good value. The form fits function perfectly. The coasters can be used on either side without compromising the stability of the beverage glass.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Lavelle

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: These are bigger than I thought and I love them! they are dishwasher safe and keep my side tables clean, definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah G.

customer_reviews.title: Clumsy set but seems to be good so far
customer_reviews.text: Holder is a bit flimsy and whole set is much bigger than what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Moore

customer_reviews.title: Lots of better looking coasters than these BUT...
customer_reviews.text: I do like these since the bumps that raise up the drink will prevent the drink from sitting in a pool of water from cups that produce condensation.
customer_reviews.author: MiG

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price but cheap quality.
customer_reviews.text: East to clean but the holder they come in is very cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylie

customer_reviews.title: Great coasters
customer_reviews.text: Size is perfect for different sizes of drinks. They look cool, too.
customer_reviews.author: kathleen cummins

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: These are good and will last a long time. They are made of a flexible silicone type material ....and are way more flexible than I was expecting but that just means they won't mar my furniture. Excellent purchase. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Red Herring

customer_reviews.title: Just what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Just what I expected, but the holder for the coasters look really cheap
customer_reviews.author: Berlin Madison

customer_reviews.title: Coasters look great and do what they're supposed to
customer_reviews.text: These coasters looks great no matter where we use them in the house. They do a great job preventing water from getting on our tables. Not much else to say. Very happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Perfect coasters!!
customer_reviews.text: Finally! Coasters that fit even the large size mugs that we use at home! Yay!! The only drawback we've found is that they are difficult to see against the dark wood of our side tables in the darkened room while watching TV. I remedied this by running silver Sharpie around the rim and wiping the excess off....looks like it was made that way! Perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: little becky

customer_reviews.title: It did a great job of collecting the condensation from my beverage glass ...
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used one of these coasters was in a conference room where I work. It did a great job of collecting the condensation from my beverage glass that I wanted a set for my home. I appreciate your expediency in getting them to me. I definitely will contact you should future need raise. Again, thank you.
customer_reviews.author: P. McClung

customer_reviews.title: I really like these coasters
customer_reviews.text: I really like these coasters. The holder is nice, but the coasters are usually not in the holder. We use them all the time and they work great on my new furniture. No marks and they hold quite a bit of condensation from the glasses. They are large enough for bigger cups. I use the large 44 oz plastic cups which do have lots of condensation.
customer_reviews.author: rug

customer_reviews.title: Better than Most
customer_reviews.text: Kinda good! Not attractive, made of basic rubber, but contains the liquid and moisture.
customer_reviews.author: The King

customer_reviews.title: Very cheerful
customer_reviews.text: I drink water out of a huge mug and these are just the right size. I love how colorful and cheerful they are. I have them all over my house.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Love these coasters.
customer_reviews.text: I love these coasters. Was tired of lifting a cup or glass and having the coaster stick, then crash back to the table. I wondered about cleaning and just took them out of the dishwasher. They are spotless. They work so well I ordered a second set.
customer_reviews.author: ryan

customer_reviews.title: Durable coasters
customer_reviews.text: Water does just sit there but they do keep it off the table
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product! Get ‘em!
customer_reviews.text: These are great, really saved our (already janky) table! Hot and cold beverages, and many, many (TOO many) beer cans later, still good to go! They tend to get little fragments of food or dust/lint, but that’s to be expected. Cleaning them seems simple enough, even for me!:)
customer_reviews.author: dj moon

customer_reviews.title: I like the size of these because they fit under all ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the size of these because they fit under all my wine goblets. The actual thickness of the coaster is thin but the dimensional grooves keep glasses raised and any condensation collects between the grooves. I have these on glass tables and they don't stick nor do they slip around the table tops. The holder is a cheap and could have been made better - hence the 4 starts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Love these coasters. They stay in place, great size... my coffee cups, wine glasses, water bottles, and canteens all fit on these coasters. Definitely worth the money. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Versatile Functional Product
customer_reviews.text: I use for coasters all over the house. They are versatile and can be used for many purposes. I use one set for padding under a gaming table. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Eastmond

customer_reviews.title: These coasters are awesome :D
customer_reviews.text: Saw the umpteen million great reviews for this when I was looking for coasters, so I bought a set. And I am very happy with this purchase. All of my other coasters are in the trash. Thanks Enkore for a simple and great product
customer_reviews.author: Trashy

customer_reviews.title: washing it
customer_reviews.text: I put a little clorox in the warm soapy water taklet it saok a few mins then take small nail brush out comes clean
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality. I love the large size
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. I love the large size. Improvement suggestion is to make the holder so that I can get the last two or three out without having to tip it upside down. Not a bid deal though.
customer_reviews.author: Rob in Denver

customer_reviews.title: Does EXACTLY what they should!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! They don't slide when you try to put a cup on them. Mainly they rock because they actually hold the condensation that drips! I have some very expensive coasters that it just runs off of and stains the tables in a nice circle pattern around them!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer H

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice coasters to truly protect the wood. I have done lots of investigations, and this is by far the best performing coaster on the market for both heat and cold dripping glasses. Has channels to hold the dripping water. Does not stick to the glasses. BEST QUALITY. LOVE THEM!!
customer_reviews.author: R. E. W.

customer_reviews.title: Great coasters!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Super grippy! The holder gives a nice place to put them when not in use. These things are nearly impossible to move with a drink on them. I find myself frustrated that I can't reposition my drink at will more often than anything else. But that's what they're there for! And plenty of room for condensation to drip below.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for your desk
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the office! I bought several packs and distributed them to everyone in our office to keep our desks—and papers— free of water rings. Easy to clean and cheap to replace.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

product_meta.title: ENKORE Coasters For Drinks - Set of 6 with Holder, Black - Protect Furniture From Water Marks or Damage - Deep Tray and Rim Catch Cold Drink Sweat Without Spill, Large 4.3 Inch Size Fit All Cups
feature_bullets: PROTECT YOUR BEAUTIFUL FURNITURE FROM WATER STAINS! Anyone who owns furniture knows how important drink coasters are for protecting against marks and rings that can be a real hassle to remove. With our functional silicone Drink Coasters Set, you can feel prepared using the best coasters to keep your furniture looking nice for years to come. Use all 6 round drinking cup mats throughout your house, make it easy to leave drinkware on your wooden furniture without harming them.

DEEPER GROOVED PATTERNS ON BOTH SIDE PROTECT YOUR FURNITURE FROM EXCESS LIQUID FROM COLD BEVERAGE, Whiskey, Cocktail, beer or alcohol. They will never leave any mark on your wooden table or bedstand. They are more wooden surface friendly than sandstone. And the real bonus is they look classy and stylish in any home! #winning

TAKE YOUR DINNER PARTY OR OFFICE MEETING TO THE NEXT OF LEVEL OF INCREDIBLE! If you are planning an upcoming gathering, you may want to get several sets to accommodate all of your guests. Placing our elegant and simple drink coasters throughout your venue, will give your friend’s permission to set their drinks down without having to hold them awkwardly or worry about drip & spill all the time. Plus, you’ll probably get several great compliments on your ENKORE Coasters throughout the event.

GIFT FOR HOME OWNERS… If you are looking for a thoughtful, useful, and decorative housewarming present, you found a winner. They will make an attractive and useful addition to any home décor, whisky bar accessories. Measured 4.3" (11cm) in diameter, enough for large Moscow mule mugs or Mason Jars! Your recipient will thank you for years to come for saving their furniture from unpleasant liquid damages or scratches. Kid safe without sharp edges, even if your little one keep throwing them around
